p: Despite the different relative potency for cytotoxicity, mutagenicity and clastogenicity after UVA irradiation (Raquet and Schrenk, 2014), all furocoumarins and citropten (as representative for methoxycoumarins) are currently grouped together and considered equally potent as the most potent furocoumarin (i.e. 5‐MOP) in a worst‐case scenario.
